sql.query:
select sum(convert(int, apln_amt)) as apln_amt from ( CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PAYMENT AS P1 INNER JOIN ( select pro1.* from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PROCESS PRO1 inner join ( select max(proc_id) AS PROC_ID, policy_apln_no from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PROCESS group by policy_apln_no ) PRO2 ON PRO1.PROC_ID = PRO2.PROC_ID AND PRO1.POLICY_APLN_NO = PRO2.POLICY_APLN_NO WHERE PRO1.proc_id <>0 $where ) AS P2
ON P1.POLICY_APLN_NO = P2.POLICY_APLN_NO $subwhere ) LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PROC_EMP AS P3 ON P2.PROC_EMP_NO = P3.EMP_NO
